messages.subject: Missing items in my order
messages.body: Hi, I just received my order #ORD-67959 but NightRest Elite is missing from the package. I ordered 2 bottles but only received 1. Can you please help?

messages.subject: Re: Missing items in my order
messages.body:
Hello Emily,

I'm so sorry to hear about this problem. I've looked into your order #ORD-67959 and can confirm the issue.

I've issued a full refund for the NightRest Elite which should appear in your account within 3-5 business days. I've also added a 20% discount code for your next order: SORRY20

Please let me know if you need anything else.

Warm regards,
Emma S.

messages.subject: Missing items in my order
messages.body: My order arrived today but it's incomplete. I'm missing SlimBoost Max from order #ORD-77748. This is really frustrating as I've been waiting for this.

messages.subject: Re: Missing items in my order
messages.body:
Hello Lauren,

I'm so sorry to hear about this problem. I've looked into your order #ORD-77748 and can confirm the issue.

I've issued a full refund for the SlimBoost Max which should appear in your account within 3-5 business days. I've also added a 20% discount code for your next order: SORRY20

Please let me know if you need anything else.

Warm regards,
Sarah M.

messages.subject: Re: Missing items in my order
messages.body: Wow, that was fast! Thank you so much Sarah M.. I really appreciate the quick response and the express shipping. This is why I keep ordering from you guys!

messages.subject: Question about PureGlow Collagen
messages.body: What's the difference between PureGlow Collagen and SlimBoost Max? Trying to decide which one to buy.

messages.subject: Re: Question about PureGlow Collagen
messages.body:
Hi Stephanie,

Thank you for reaching out, and I sincerely apologize for this issue with your order.

I've already processed a replacement shipment for the PureGlow Collagen - it will ship today with express delivery at no extra charge. You should receive it within 2-3 business days.

Tracking number: 1Z925363382

Is there anything else I can help you with?

Best,
James R.

messages.subject: Where is my order??
messages.body: My order #ORD-46875 was supposed to arrive 5 days ago. Where is it? I need my SlimBoost Max!

messages.subject: Re: Where is my order??
messages.body:
Hello Brandon,

I understand your frustration, but I need to explain our policy.

Subscription cancellations must be made at least 48 hours before the next billing date. Since your next shipment has already been processed, we cannot cancel this month's order.

Your subscription has been cancelled for future months.

Regards,
Emma S.

messages.subject: Re: Where is my order??
messages.body: I understand. That's disappointing but I appreciate you explaining the policy. I'll use the discount code for my next order. Thanks.

messages.subject: Wrong product received
messages.body: Wrong product in my order #ORD-50385. I wanted MindSharp Focus not GutHealth Plus. Very disappointing.

messages.subject: Re: Wrong product received
messages.body:
Hi Amanda,

Thank you for contacting us about your MindSharp Focus order.

Unfortunately, our return policy only covers items within 30 days of purchase. Since your order was placed 87 days ago, we're unable to process a refund at this time.

However, I'd like to offer you a 25% discount on your next order as a gesture of goodwill.

Best,
Sarah M.

messages.subject: Re: Wrong product received
messages.body: I've been waiting 3 days for a response and THIS is what I get? A generic email? You clearly don't care about your customers.

messages.subject: Cancel my subscription ASAP
messages.body: Please cancel my NightRest Elite subscription. I've been trying to do this online for days with no luck.

messages.subject: Re: Cancel my subscription ASAP

Thank you for your patience. Is there anything else I can help you with?

Best,
Emma S.

messages.body:

I understand your frustration and I've escalated this to my supervisor. Someone from our management team will reach out within 24 hours to resolve this.

We truly value your business and want to make this right.

Sincerely,
Lisa K.
